text: is a railway station on the Kishigawa Line operated by the Wakayama Electric Railway. It is located in Wakayama, Wakayama Prefecture, Japan. The station is named after the nearby Hinokuma Shrine, which is also alternatively pronounced as "Nichizengū". == Ridership == {| class="wikitable" style="margin: 1em 0.2em; text-align: center;" ! colspan="2" |Ridership per day |- !Year !Ridership |- |2011 |592 |- |2012 |587 |- |2013 |628 |- |2014 |620 |- |2015 |777 |- |2016 |738 |- |2017 |730 |} == Adjacent stations == == References == Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1916 Category:Railway stations in Wakayama Prefecture
title: Nichizengū Station
